data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Chicago close to the penalty box.
In the minute 2, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a throw-in for Chicago, close to Montreal's area.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
Chicago to take a throw-in in Montreal territory.
In the minute 3, Chicago awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Montreal.
Goal kick for Chicago at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 6, Bojan Krkic (Montreal) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards Chicago a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Chicago.
Chicago's Djordje Mihailovic looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Djordje Mihailovic is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 11, In Harrison Montreal's Maximiliano Urruti is caught offside.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Montreal.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Montreal throw-in in Chicago's half.
In the minute 13, Free kick Chicago.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Chicago.
Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
In the minute 15, Robert Beric scores to make it 0-1 at Red Bull Arena.
Great play from Djordje Mihailovic to set up the goal.
Chicago needs to be cautious. Montreal have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 18, Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lassi Lappalainen grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Chicago at Red Bull Arena.
Can Chicago get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
Chicago push upfield but Guido Gonzales Jr quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Chicago.
Throw-in Chicago.
Montreal's Maximiliano Urruti is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Montreal.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Chicago throw-in in Montreal's half.
Fabian Herbers of Chicago smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 34, Can Montreal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Chicago's half?
Montreal to take a throw-in in Chicago territory.
Montreal to take a throw-in in Chicago territory.
In the minute 36, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
Throw-in for Montreal in their own half.
Miguel Navarro for Chicago gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 38, Montreal have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Montreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Chicago drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 41, Djordje Mihailovic of Chicago gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
Ball safe as Chicago is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Montreal throw-in in Chicago's half.
Free kick in a good position for Montreal!
Maximiliano Urruti gets his shot on target but fails to score for Montreal.
In the minute 45, Montreal have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Victor Wanyama (Montreal) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Montreal have a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Harrison.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
Free kick Chicago.
Chicago to take a throw-in in Montreal territory.
In the minute 49, Can Chicago get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Robert Beric for Chicago is whistled offside.
In the minute 51, Chicago's Gaston Gimenez misses with an attempt on goal.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards Montreal a goal kick.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Chicago throw-in in Montreal's half.
In the minute 53, Fabian Herbers (Chicago) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
Chicago awarded a throw-in in their own half.

Can Chicago get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?

Chicago have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 59, Guido Gonzales Jr awards Montreal a goal kick.
Throw-in for Montreal in their own half.

Montreal needs to be cautious. Chicago have an attacking throw-in.

In the minute 65, Goal kick for Chicago at Red Bull Arena.
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Montreal.
In the minute 67, Goal! Maximiliano Urruti gives Montreal a 2-1 lead.
Zachary Brault Guillard instrumental with a fine assist.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
In the minute 72, Raphael Wicky is making the team's first substitution at Red Bull Arena with C.J. Sapong replacing Fabian Herbers.
Raphael Wicky (Chicago) is making a second substitution, with Jonathan Bornstein replacing Miguel Navarro.
In the minute 73, Chicago have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Chicago drive upfield and Francisco Calvo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Montreal defender.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Elliot Collier is on a sub for Djordje Mihailovic for Chicago.
In the minute 73, Francisco Calvo (Chicago) nets with a header to make it 2-2 at Red Bull Arena.
Alvaro Medran with an assist there.
In the minute 75, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
Zachary Brault Guillard (Montreal) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Chicago goal kick.
C.J. Sapong (Chicago) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 78, Montreal make their first substitution with Clement Bayiha replacing Shamit Shome.
Free kick Montreal.
In the minute 79, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Chicago.
Samuel Piette (Montreal) gets a yellow card.
Can Chicago capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Montreal's half?
Montreal pushes forward through Lassi Lappalainen, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Montreal.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Chicago awarded a throw-in in their own half.

In the minute 87, Amar Sejdic is replacing Maximiliano Urruti for Montreal at Red Bull Arena.
Raphael Wicky is making the team's fourth substitution at Red Bull Arena with Johan Kappelhof replacing Boris Sekulic.
Brandt Bronico is replacing Robert Beric for Chicago at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 88, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Montreal throw-in in Chicago's half.
Throw-in for Chicago in their own half.
Throw-in for Chicago at Red Bull Arena.
Montreal are pushing forward but Samuel Piette's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Chicago at Red Bull Arena.

It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
